workout.name: 15 Day Challenge
workout.purchaseDescription:
Welcome to the FXP Hula HoopÂ® 15 Day Challenge! This Fitness Challenge has been created for those who are just getting started on their fitness journey and who want to burn fuel, tone muscles, and sculpt their entire body!
This Challenge is made up of a variety of low-impact, high intensity exercises that consistently promote optimal caloric burn through a variety of proven exercises!
Purchase our 15 Day Challenge Today and get access to our proven workouts that will help you burn fuel, enable you to track points, stay motivated, and get those results you desire!

day.title: Total Body Sculpt Workout
day.description: Congratulations! Today you start your 15 - Day FXP Hula Hoop Challenge! Today your goal is to work it out with this Total Body Tone segment. You will be challenged to keep your core muscles engaged through out the workout. You will have many different exercises in this workout that promote sculpting of your arms, abs, thighs, and glutes while you keep them engaged while utilizing the FXP Hula Hoop for added Strenghtening and Stability.
day.completeDescription: Congratulations! You just completed today's Total Body Tone session! While burning fuels, you targeted the muscles of the thighs, glutes, arms and abs. Keep up the Great Work! See you tomorrow for your Cardio Burn session!

exercise.name: Waist Hooping - Basic Stance - Dominate Leg Forward
exercise.note: Warm - Up: This exercise is designed to boost your heart rate and to get your body warmed up to take on this workout!

exercise.name: Sumo Squats
exercise.note: Warm - Up: This exercise is designed to boost your heart rate and to get your body warmed up to take on this workout!

exercise.name: Sumo Squats with Torso Rotation
exercise.note: Warm - Up: This exercise is designed to boost your heart rate and to get your body warmed up to take on this workout!

exercise.name: Wide 2nd Plie' with Heel Lift
exercise.note: This exercise is meant to tone and sculpt the thighs and calves while activating the abdominals as you curl.

exercise.name: Wide 2nd Plie' with Oblique Curls
exercise.note: This exercise is meant to tone and sculpt the thighs and calves while activating the abdominals as you curl.

exercise.name: T-Back Kick
exercise.note: This exercise is meant to sculpt and define the glutes and thighs.

exercise.name: T-Back Cross Overs
exercise.note: This exercise is meant to sculpt and define the glutes and thighs.

exercise.name: Zip It
exercise.note: This exercise is meant to activate your core muscles as you tone and sculpt your arms, chest and shoulders.

exercise.name: Zip It Up
exercise.note: This exercise is meant to activate your core muscles as you tone and sculpt your arms, chest and shoulders.

exercise.name: Tone the Triceps
exercise.note: This exercise is meant to activate your core muscles as you tone and sculpt your arms, chest and shoulders.

exercise.name: Tone the Triceps with Balance
exercise.note: This exercise is meant to activate your core muscles as you tone and sculpt your arms, chest and shoulders.

exercise.name: Reach for the Stars
exercise.note: This exercise is meant to activate your core muscles as you tone and sculpt your arms, chest and shoulders.

exercise.name: Thigh Stretch
exercise.setOrRep: Hold each stretch at least 30 seconds.
exercise.note: This exercise is meant to stretch and lengthen the thighs, glutes and hips and release the arms while challenging your core for balance.

exercise.name: Figure 4 Stretch
exercise.setOrRep: Hold each stretch at least 30 seconds.
exercise.note: This exercise is meant to stretch and lengthen the thighs, glutes and hips and release the arms while challenging your core for balance.

exercise.name: Warrior Stretch
exercise.setOrRep: Hold each stretch at least 30 seconds.
exercise.note: This exercise is meant to stretch and lengthen the thighs, glutes and hips and release the arms while challenging your core for balance.

exercise.name: Dancer
exercise.setOrRep: Hold each stretch at least 30 seconds.
exercise.note: This exercise is meant to stretch and lengthen the thighs, glutes and hips and release the arms while challenging your core for balance.

day.title: Thigh and Glutes
day.description: Today your goal is to work out with this Thighs and Glutes segment. After a quick warm up you will begin sculpting your Thighs and Glutes while engaging the core muscles as well. We will utilize the FXP Hula Hoop for added Strenghtening and Stability.
day.completeDescription: Congratulations! You just completed today's Thighs and Glutes session! During this workout you toned and sculpted the thighs and glutes. Keep up the Great Work! See you tomorrow for your Cardio Hoop HIIT!

exercise.note: Warm - Up: This exercise is designed to boost your heart rate and to get your body warmed up to take on this workout!

exercise.setOrRep: Hold each stretch at least 30 seconds.
exercise.note: This exercise is meant to stretch and lengthen the muscles of the thighs, hips and outer thighs.

exercise.name: Figure 4 Stretch
exercise.setOrRep: Hold each stretch at least 30 seconds.

exercise.name: Warrior Stretch
exercise.setOrRep: Hold each stretch at least 30 seconds.
exercise.note: This exercise is meant to stretch and lengthen the thighs, glutes and hips and release the arms while challenging your core for balance.

day.title: Abs and Arms
day.description: Today your goal is to work it out with this Arms and Abs segment. After a quick warm up you will engage your abdominals and sculpt your arms and shoulders, while utilizing the FXP Hula Hoop for added Strenghtening and Stability.
day.completeDescription: Congratulations! You just completed today's Abs and Arms session! These moves targeted the upper body. Sculpting and defining the arms, shoulders and abs. Keep up the Great Work! See you tomorrow for your Cardio Hoop HIIT session!

day.title: Cardio Hoop HIIT
day.description: Today your goal is to work out with this Cardio Hoop HIIT segment. You will be challenged to keep your core muscles engaged through out the workout. In addition to igniting the metabolism you will tone and sculpt the muscles of your lower body.
day.completeDescription: Congratulations! You just completed today's Cardio Hoop HIIT session! During this workout you burned some serious fuel as well as toned the thighs and glutes. Keep up the Great Work! See you tomorrow for your Cardio Hoop HIIT session!

exercise.name: Thigh Stretch
exercise.setOrRep: Hold each stretch at least 30 seconds.
exercise.note: This exercise is meant to stretch and lengthen the muscles of the thighs, hips and outer thighs.

exercise.name: Figure 4 Stretch
exercise.setOrRep: Hold each stretch at least 30 seconds.
exercise.note: This exercise is meant to stretch and lengthen the muscles of the thighs, hips and outer thighs.

exercise.name: Warrior Stretch
exercise.setOrRep: Hold each stretch at least 30 seconds.
exercise.note: This exercise is meant to stretch and lengthen the thighs, glutes and hips and release the arms while challenging your core for balance.

day.title: Abs and Arms
day.description: Today your goal is to work it out with this Arms and Abs segment. After a quick warm up you will engage your abdominals and sculpt your arms and shoulders, while utilizing the FXP Hula Hoop for added Strenghtening and Stability.
day.completeDescription: Congratulations! You just completed today's Abs and Arms session! These moves targeted the upper body. Sculpting and defining the arms, shoulders and abs. Keep up the Great Work! See you tomorrow for your Cardio Hoop HIIT session!

day.title: Cardio Hoop HIIT
day.description: Today your goal is to work out with this Cardio Hoop HIIT segment. You will be challenged to keep your core muscles engaged through out the workout. In addition to igniting the metabolism you will tone and sculpt the muscles of your lower body.
day.completeDescription: Congratulations! You just completed today's Cardio Hoop HIIT session! During this workout you burned some serious fuel as well as toned the thighs and glutes. Keep up the Great Work! See you tomorrow for your Cardio Hoop HIIT session!

day.title: Cardio Burn + Arms and Abs
day.description: Today your goal is to work out with this Cardio Burn plus Arms and Abs segment. After a fuel blasting warm up you will engage your abdominals and sculpt your arms and shoulders, while utilizing the FXP Hula Hoop for added Strenghtening and Stability.
day.completeDescription: Congratulations! You just completed today's Cardio Burn plus Arms and Abs session! These moves targeted the upper body with the goal of Sculpting and defining the arms, shoulders and ab. Plus your burned major fuel! Congratulations, Your 15 day journey is complete! What journey will you embark on next? Check out the other Challenges we have to offer! Keep up the Great Work! Go online to fxpfitness.com to engage with our community and share your story!
